{"id":917555344,"question_id":2695,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1679154876,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"582 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/917555344/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Score of an Array After Marking All Elements","memory":"145 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    using pii = pair<int, int>;\n    long long findScore(vector<int>& nums) {\n        priority_queue<pii, vector<pii>, greater<pii> > p;\n        unordered_set<int> s;\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) p.push({nums[i], i});\n        while(!p.empty()){\n            pii top = p.top(); p.pop();\n            //cout << top.first << ' ' << top.second << endl;\n            if(s.find(top.second) == s.end()){ \n                //cout << \"add \" << top.first << ' ' << top.second << endl;\n                s.insert(top.second);\n                ans += top.first;\n                if(top.second > 0) s.insert(top.second - 1);\n                if(top.second < nums.size() - 1) s.insert(top.second + 1);\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-score-of-an-array-after-marking-all-elements","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
